title: Harold Finch VS. Machine (Chess)
author: shikivile
comment: The third part of this flashback -- which is not there in this video -- might be my favorite single scene of the TV show. "Chess is just a game and real people aren't pieces. You can't assign more value to some of them than to others. Not to me, not to anyone. People are not a thing you can sacrifice. The lesson is that anyone who looks on the world as if it was a game of chess deserves to lose."
this episode was one of the best in .....  TV HISTORY
I miss POI so much. Imma watch them all AGAIN!
The machine was initially using a greedy approach I guess :D

Best father-child moment
I like the kind of hand-holding and teaching Harold does with the machine, treating it like his child
description:
Person Of Interest
From season 4, episode 11.
